meanings.definition: Capable of enduring difficult conditions or situations.
meanings.sent1: The hardiest plants in the garden survived the harsh winter.
meanings.sent2: She proved to be the hardiest hiker in the group, never complaining about the tough trail.
meanings.sent3: Despite being the hardiest camper, he still couldn't handle the mosquitoes.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was the hardiest of them all, never giving up in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The hardiest explorers braved the storm to reach the summit.

meanings.definition: Most resistant to cold or harsh conditions.
meanings.sent1: The hardiest animals in the Arctic have thick fur to keep them warm.
meanings.sent2: The hardiest climbers reached the summit of the icy mountain.
meanings.sent3: Even the hardiest penguin couldn't stand the freezing temperatures.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was the hardiest of them all, never backing down in the chill of winter.
meanings.sent5: The hardiest sailors braved the stormy seas to reach their destination.
